org.apache.hawq.pxf.plugins.hdfs

Class HdfsDataFragmenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hawq.pxf.api.utilities.Plugin
      • org.apache.hawq.pxf.api.Fragmenter
        • org.apache.hawq.pxf.plugins.hdfs.HdfsDataFragmenter

  • public class HdfsDataFragmenter
extends Fragmenter
    Fragmenter class for HDFS data resources. Given an HDFS data source (a file, directory, or wild card pattern) divide the data into fragments and return a list of them along with a list of host:port locations for each.

    • Method Detail

      • getFragments

        public java.util.List<Fragment> getFragments()
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the fragments for a data source URI that can appear as a file name, a directory name or a wildcard. Returns the data fragments in JSON format.
        Specified by:
        getFragments in class Fragmenter
        Returns:
        list of data fragments
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if fragment list could not be retrieved

      • getFragmentsStats

        public FragmentsStats getFragmentsStats()
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: Fragmenter
        Default implementation of statistics for fragments. The default is:
        • number of fragments - as gathered by Fragmenter.getFragments()
        • first fragment size - 64MB
        • total size - number of fragments times first fragment size
        Each fragmenter implementation can override this method to better match its fragments stats.
        Overrides:
        getFragmentsStats in class Fragmenter
        Returns:
        default statistics
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if statistics cannot be gathered
